name: YY1_GM12878_K562_with_DNase_dataset
description: Student-ready dataset builder for reproducing Arvey et al. 2012 sequence and DNase models: 1000 YY1 peaks in GM12878 and K562, 100-bp sequences, matched negatives, DNase 5x100bp bins, labels.

100bp FASTA sequences centered at peak summits
outputs.processed/sequences_k562_peaks_100bp.fa: 100bp FASTA sequences centered at peak summits
outputs.processed/dnase_gm12878_5x100bp.tsv: DNase signal in 5 bins of 100bp centered at peaks
outputs.processed/dnase_k562_5x100bp.tsv: DNase signal in 5 bins of 100bp centered at peaks
outputs.processed/labels.tsv: Unified labels file for ML training
outputs.scripts/build_dataset.py: Reproducible builder that downloads inputs and generates processed files
